name: Kick Ball 3D Sport
description:
Kick Ball 3D Sport is all about mastering your free kicks, through blood, sweat and tears on the pitch.This game features convenient and user-friendly free kick shots and easy control over a goalkeeper.
In order to block a ball while playing for goalkeeper, you should find a good position and the goalkeeper will stop the ball with a great jumping move.
Features:
- Realistic designed free kick and penalty simulator
- Play for both for striker forward and for goalkeeper
- Intuitive controls
- Wide choice of top team all around the world
